app.name: WhatsApp Notifications
app.short_description: Allows to send proactive messages to Whatsapp.
app.long_description: Allows to send proactive messages to Whatsapp throught the SUnchine Conversation Notification API.
app.installation_instructions:
Please make sure that the Notification API has been enable for your account.
The Sunshine Conversations Team can help you get the value of each parameter.

appId.label: Sunshine Conversations ID
appId.helpText:
ID of your app on the Sunshine Conversations dashboard (URL: https://smooch.io)
Please make sure that the Notification API has been enable for your account.

jwt.label: Sunshine Conversations App token

integrationId.label: WhatsApp Integration ID
integrationId.helpText: Extract if from the URL of your WhatsApp Integration on the Sunshine Conversations dashboard: https://app.smooch.io/apps/<<YOUR APP ID>>/channels/<<YOUR WA INTEGRATION ID>>

namespace.label: WhatsApp Namespace
namespace.helpText: The namespace of your WABA given by Whatsapp or Sunshine Conversations

templates.label: Enabled WA templates
templates.helpText: Input the list of WA templates that you want to enable on ZD Support, separated by commas (no whitespace!).

language.label: Template language
language.helpText: Language to apply to ALL template (for example en\_US or pt\_BR)
